name: The Hidden Treasure Room
description: Jackpot!  A small room filled with treasure chests!  Go get them!

exits.keywords: trapdoor trap~ 1 -1 6414 S #6417 A Hallway~    This hall runs through the tower.  There's more hall to the west, and doors to your north and south.  A door to the east leads back to the stairwell.
